name: Robocracy
storyline:
Disturbing signals are coming from the edges of explored space. Rebel robots have learned to cooperate and are building bases on uninhabited planets. Their new goal is to enslave all "bags of bones," also known as humans, under the rule of Robocracy.

The Galactic Rangers are called to deal with this new threat!

They've proven that humanity can rely on them to defend against machines. But this time, the challenge is tougher than ever — you’ll be up against upgraded robot models!

Find and stop the Robocracy before it’s too late! Defend the simple joys of human civilization: cute kittens, breakfast in bed, funny memes, and internet arguments!
summary: Fight the mad artificial intelligence and save mankind from becoming slaves of robots!
